attributes.action: David Cameron to reconsider plans to allow 20,000 refugees into the UK by 2020.
attributes.background: With the potential for Isis members to be amongst the refugees as they plan is to spread into Western Europe. This is a serious terror threat to the UK. David Cameron needs to reconsider now

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107355

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
